duties_responsibilities.duty: Independently handle complex policies and work with multiple AIP systems.
Proactively understand supplemental products and their intricacies.
Manage written agreements, identify cross-selling opportunities, mentor and train other Insurance Specialists.
Manage post-commitment policy administration, claim process management, reporting forms, and resolving policy issues.
Establish and maintain strong customer relationships by providing quality service and taking ownership of customer issues.
Identify future customer needs, aid walk-in and phone-in customers, and act as a key resource for insurance customers.
Seek cross-selling opportunities and provide account support to Insurance Officers and team members.
Assist in the identification of future customer needs, providing account support to Insurance Officers and team members, and helping prepare quotes and update CRM systems.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Ag Business, Finance, Business or a closely related field or likewise work experience
